thread.title: D&D London announce launch of new events and outside catering business with Lena Björck
thread.title_full: D&D London announce launch of new events and outside catering business with Lena Björck

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: D&D London announce launch of new events and outside catering business with Lena Björck
text:
D&D London announce launch of new events and outside catering business with Lena Björck D&D London announce launch of new events and outside catering business with Lena Björck Details Category: Agency & Association   16:45 D&D London announced today the launch of a new events and outside catering business in a joint venture with Lena Björck. Lena has been a very successful businesswoman in her own right. She built from scratch a £2m p.a. catering business called Inn or Out which she sold last year. She has also won a number of female Entrepreneur of the Year awards. 
CEO & Chairman Des Gunewardena said “I have known Lena for many years. She will bring to D&D the entrepreneurial drive needed to make our outside catering and events business the substantial success which I believe it can be. Lena will work closely with Mark Ivackovic, our Sales Director, who continues to oversee sales within D&D venues” Lena said “I am really excited about our joint venture, I think that the combination of my experience in delivering memorable events and D&D's expertise in developing successful businesses will make a great partnership.” Related articles
